blackstorm:

Blackstorm typed more buttons, hoping that that could help her to 
heal more quickly.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/17/03 11:37:07 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackstorm looked this diagnostic worried and she typed some 
> > buttons, hopping to get more info about the trouble
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> Diagnostics ran, but would not nor could not specify reason as to 
healing. 
> Only that she was not healing. But... the computers did indicate 
that there 
> was a problem. was it just too early to detect it?  
> 
> The organic part of her techno-organic form was barely healing. 
The techno 
> part was very slowly repairing. Part of the damage that Rodimus 
had done was 
> enough to cause some of this. 
> 
> She... just laid there in her current state.
